content: soupr bowl cozy terry liann morris sailingknitter this bowl shaped hot pad is designed to be used with your microwave safe bowls to provide a structure for you to hold when your food is hot lift the edges of the cozy up and out on two sides to safely transport your meal to the table of course you can use these on other bowls just set the bowl in the cozy and add your hot food these can also be used to keep ice cream cold in the summer time materials 200 yds 100% cotton worsted weight yarn such as lily sugar n cream takes more than one ball do not use acrylic or wool as they are a fire hazard in a microwave us size 5 3 75 mm circular needle double point needles or 2 circs for bottom finishing 4 stitch markers waste yarn if using the provisional cast on method sizes 7 diameter gauge 5 sts = 1 over stockinette stitch notes 1 to prevent burns and hold the temperatures better this cozy is constructed of two identical pieces which are joined together to form a reversible double thickness 2 choose a cast on method depending on how you want to join and finish the edges of the two pieces layers you will make a provisional cast on more time consuming but produces a nice finished look + no sewing required b regular cast on faster to get started but will require hand whip stitching or crochet edging the two pieces together 3 in the instructions the term slip 2 k1 p2sso is a double decrease slip the next 2 sts as if to knit knit 1 st pass the 2 slipped sts back over the knit st you will have decreased 2 sts 4 you can easily make this cozy larger by using larger needles and deeper by increasing the length you knit before working bowl bottom decreases cozy bowls make 2 using either a provisional cast on or your normal cast on method see note 2 cast on 116 sts join to knit in the round taking care not to twist sts place marker to indicate beginning and end of rnds round 1 knit around round 2 *k26 slip 2 k1 p2sso place marker repeat from * 3 more times for a complete round omitting the last marker as it has already been placed to indicate the end of the round ©copyright terry liann morris 2019 questions comments email sailingknitter@yahoo com http //www ravelry com/designers/terry-morris soupr bowl cozy page 1 round 3 knit around round 4 *knit to 3 sts before marker slip 2 k1 p2sso repeat from * 3 more times for a complete round repeat rnds 3 & 4 only 3 more times you will have 76 sts knit all rnds even until piece measures 2 ½ from cast on edge as measured from a flat side not a point bowl shaping decreases round 1 *knit to 2 sts before marker k2tog remove
